channel.title: Compile help pl0x?
channel.description:
ok, sooo im in the middle of trynna make a server. I wanted to edit a few things in "Client.java" When i was done editing i wanted to compile because well thats what you have to do.
When i try to compile. I get the black box. and it doesn't even say anything in it. then all of a sudden it says "Press any key to continue"
When i "continue" it closes itself obviously. But it doesnt change the settings i tried to change?
Why wont it compile?

item.title: Compile help pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

The path in the complier isn’t pointed at the client class (the byte code of client.java) so it isn’t compiling, mess around with your complier for a bit and eventually you’ll get it.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile help pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @mickeymaster mickeymaster
item.description:
@mickeymaster wrote:

mate, have you edited the compiling JDK to where it reads your files? If not/dont know how message me ill tell you how

Read full topic

item.title: Compile help pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

Idk, why can’t it?

You haven’t given me or anyone else enough information.

Read full topic
